BaseState

@objc
open class BaseState : NSObject

BaseState is the base State class from which all State classes will be derived

Variable declarations
  • stateId

    State Id of the State Object

    Since

    Since 1.1.0

  • getViewController()

    Method getViewController is to be implemented by all state classes which gives the next ViewController

    Since

    Since 1.1.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
open func getViewController() -> UIViewController?

    Return Value

    Viewcontroller that is to be navigated

  • setStateCompletionDelegate(_:)

    This method sets the delegate for StateCommunicationListener protocol

    Since

    Since 1.1.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func setStateCompletionDelegate(_ handler: StateCommunicationListener?)

    Parameters
